: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus was having fun playing with his daughter, but his thoughts started to dwell on Nightlight. He wished she was there so they could all be together as a family.

Rodimus tossed Elita up just a little bit, then cought her.


Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:
Elita:

Elita Laughtes Aloud, that was such fun. She was gigglig pleaced  while she spread her little arms toward her dad

<DIV><STRONG>: : Rodimus Prime : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P>Rodimus was having fun playing with his daughter, but his thoughts started to dwell on Nightlight. He wished she was there so they could all be together as a family.</P>
<P>Rodimus tossed Elita up just a little bit, then cought her.</P>
